Focus Incident Alert

 

Dear , 

Focus Incident INC#157068 has been assigned to you 

 

Focus Incident Details

 

Store

 

Mall

Swarovski - The Avenues 3 - Boutique

 

The Avenues 3

Category

Reporting Theft Case

Details

 

 

Store manager shall follow the instructions of the HSSE Department if a theft is confirmed .
حالة سرقة مؤكدة
Dear team ,
after receiving confirmation from your side about the theft case was happened at 19 April at 1:30pm at our pink room ,the theft was stolen two bracelet.
item VPN# 5648937 
item VPN# 5720870 .

 

Alternately, click here <https://rso.e-mac.com/pages/ManageINC.aspx?INCGUID=90591668-3c72-38a7-c5e2-7941dda7978e>  to review it on Focus.

This is an auto-generated email, please do not reply. For any further query, please contact RSO@mailmac.net <mailto:RSO@mailmac.net> .

 


--------------------------------------------------

Best Regards,
Hagop
